titleStmt.title: Liberty of conscience pleaded by several weighty reasons on the behalf of the people of God called Quakers and also, on the behalf of others whose consciences are tender towards God : with a tender message of love unto the King / written by William Smith.
titleStmt.author: Smith, William, d. 1673.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by William Warwick,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
